channel.title: How do i change the weather? please reply its for my birthday march 18
channel.description:
I know in the Data folder and weather but whats some of the code O.O
or it the command ::getweather issnowing
O.O

item.title: How do i change the weather? please reply its for my birthday march 18
item.dc:creator: @Slappa4 Slappa4
item.description:
@Slappa4 wrote:

Well, the way I do it is I go into my private server folder, then into my data folder, then I go to the notepad labeled weather, and I change the default 3 to something different. I don’t know what number is what so you will just have to experiment. Hope this helped! And I hope you have a great birthday!

veito:

Same birthday

Hope you have a great birthday too, veito!

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change the weather? please reply its for my birthday march 18
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Add like boundaries like how it tells if wilderness or not. And just add IsSnowing = 1; like that. Im not sure i havn’t tried but this is how it would seem to work, becuase it always snows on waterbrith island in Rs2.

item.title: How do i change the weather? please reply its for my birthday march 18
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

well, i know there is a way to make it snow for you but not for everyone else, and thats by adding this command

else if (command.startsWith("snow")) { IsSnowing = 1; }

if i can figure out how to make it snow when u log in i will tell ya

item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

[quote=“kedonot1, post:1, topic:187845”]I know in the Data folder and weather but whats some of the code O.O

or it the command
::getweather issnowing

O.O[/quote]

Not sure what you mean but I think like you said go to data folder and there’s a text folder called weather. Double click it and change it to 1-3. 3 is normal. I forgot what the others do…One of them is like dark smoke the other one is snow. Some other ones. Never changed weather before
